messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3375
messages.msgSnippet: on 4/28/03 9:03 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Of course, that s not stupid. The piece you re missing, IMO, is that the only way she might love
messages.messageBody:
on 4/28/03 9:03 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Maybe it's stupid of me, but I think it would be great to love to learn math
> as much as one loves any other aspect of learning. Not to have the dreaded
> fear I've seen repeated over and over with others when it comes to the
> "math".

Of course, that's not stupid. The piece you're missing, IMO, is that the
only way she might love math is if it comes to her when she wants it and is
ready. You've tried some math strewing that isn't taking, and that's okay.

Paula
